mdRecord.dcterms:title: "Identity Puzzles."; 01 of 01
mdRecord.dcterms:description: 3. Doepner/Faulds--NotesItems 1-134--Clippings ScrapbookPage 36 (front of added page); "Identity Puzzles."; Discusses identification methods that are questionable and fallible when based on clothing or mannerisms. This occurred with the "river Seine" tragedy, the "Sinn Fein" attack on the Dublin Custom House, and other incidents.; by a "magistrates' clerk", Daily Dispatch; DF 654
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Identification
